text.section: Subject to subsection (b) of this section, during or after an examination or investigation of a domestic, foreign, or alien society, the Commissioner may not make public or allow to become public a financial statement, report, or finding that affects the status, standing, or rights of the society.

The Commissioner may make public or allow to become public a financial statement, report, or finding described in subsection (a) of this section after:
a copy of the financial statement, report, or finding has been served on the society at its principal office; and
the society has been given a reasonable opportunity to answer the financial statement, report, or finding.
